definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: Mayo stood before the automatic door of the Toritsu Chuuou library.
sentences.chinese: 现在，真夜正站在国家图书馆的正门前。
巴黎，国家图书馆，中文手稿9277。

sentences.english: I would also like to warmly welcome Madam Chang Pijun and her colleagues from the National Library of China.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎常副馆长率领的中国国家图书馆代表团来英交流。

sentences.english: Of this literature pieces are stored in the National Library in Turin.
sentences.chinese: 这种文献的残片，现存放于都灵市的国家图书馆。

sentences.english: The Bibliothèque nationale de France in Paris organizes a retrospective of his graphic work.
sentences.chinese: 法国国家图书馆为他的绘画作品举办了个人回顾展。

sentences.english: Please abide by the regulations and obey directions given by library staff.
sentences.chinese: 请自觉遵守公共秩序和国家图书馆各项管理规定。

sentences.english: The National Library and National Museum are responsible for a complete archive of the hudhud.
sentences.chinese: 国家图书馆和国家博物馆在为圣歌建立全套的档案。

sentences.english: Most of his oratorios are in the Bibliothèque Nationale at Paris .
sentences.chinese: 他的清唱剧大部分是在国家图书馆在巴黎。

definition: to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3

definition: books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
Joint Publishing, bookstore chain and publisher, founded in Hong Kong in 1948
Siku Quanshu (collection of books compiled during Qing dynasty)
